channel.title: Macbook Pro on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Macbook Pro on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: New system checklist
item.description: A new job means a new computer. I’m keeping the old one plugged in in the attic, and setting up the new one from scratch without doing a wholesale file copy. The old machine had done good service, but I made a mistake when buying it of not getting the maximum sized SSD drive. At the end I was running at 95% disk full - that’s no way to run a system.
